thread.title: Playboy model Sara Underwood poses for sexy snaps in exotic locations around the world for saucy travel blog
thread.title_full: Playboy model Sara Underwood poses for sexy snaps in exotic locations around the world for saucy travel blog

author: Vicki Newman
title: Playboy model Sara Underwood poses for sexy snaps in exotic locations around the world for saucy travel blog
text:
Playboy model Sara Underwood poses for sexy snaps in exotic locations around the world for saucy travel blog The former Playmate of the Year is causing a storm on Instagram with her amazing snaps Share Sara Underwood is causing a storm with her saucy travel blog (Photo: Instagram @ saraunderwood) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Playmate of the Year Sara Underwood is turning heads with her sexy travel blog. 
The Playboy model and actress is taking the internet by storm with her saucy snaps in exotic places around the world 
The 32-year-old has found a legion of loyal fans after posting a series of bikini-clad pics to Instagram. 
The blonde beauty has travelled to stunning locations around the globe, posed naked in hot springs, flashed her bum in front of mountains and posed topless with her best pal, Mother Nature. Read More She's picked up 7 million followers (Photo: Instagram @ saraunderwood) Sara's blog is a hit with fans (Photo: Instagram @ saraunderwood) 
The stunning model shows she has a hilarious sense of humour too. 
In one snap, she bends over in front of a puff of smoke, captioning it 'Pardon muah' and holding her hand over her mouth to mimic embarrassment. 
She has a sweet side too, demonstrated by her posing up with a tiny Shetland pony in a muddy field. 
Crouching down to his level and holding his face in her hands, she wrote: "I love him so hard it hurts #bae". Sara is causing a storm on Instagram (Photo: Instagram @ saraunderwood) 
Sara first appeared in Playboy in October 2005. She was pictured on the cover holding a football and covered only by body paint. 
She was labelled Playmate of the Month when she next appeared in the magazine in July 2006, and became Playmate of the Year in 2007. 
Her saucy travel pics have seen her pick up an impressive 7 million followers on Instagram. 
Every picture she posts garners hundreds of comments with people telling her how beautiful she is - as well as the stunning locations she poses in. 
Some fans even suggest places she should visit and offer to give her lessons in popular activities to their area. 
One wrote: "You should come to beaver creek! I'll teach you how to ski!!!" 
Some feel that the focus of the pictures should always be Sara and not the stunning locations she's visiting. 
"Precious landscape, honey, but your beauty is almost invisible!!! You must be always in front!!!," said one fan. Like us on Facebook
